text: Ārau māda'iẏānabāsī sakalara ōcarata siham̐tara bhātr̥ churaā'ibaka (praēraṇa karaichilō). Tē'ōm̐ kaichila, ‘hē mōra sampradāẏa! Tōmālōkē kērala āllāhara ibādata karaā. Tē'ōm̐ra bāhiraē tōmālōkara āna kōnō satya ilāha nā'i. Tōmālōkara pratipālakara taraphara paraā tōmālōkara ōcarata spaṣṭa pramāṇa āhi pā'ichē. Gatikē tōmālōkē jōkha-māpata ōjana paraipūrṇa pradāna karaibā, mānuhaka siham̐tara praāpya bastu kama nidibā, ārau pr̥thiraīta śānti sthāpanara pichata biparyaẏa sr̥ṣṭi nakaraibā, ē'iṭōraē'i tōmālōkara bābē kalyāṇakara yadi tōmālōkē mumina hōraā’
